name: bluemoon
description:
bluemoon - Bluemoon configuration utility

DESCRIPTION

bluemoon - Bluemoon configuration utility Usage:

bluemoon [options]

OPTIONS

-A, --bdaddr [addr]

Set Bluetooth address

-F, --firmware [file]

Load firmware

-C, --check <file>

Check firmware image

-R, --reset

Reset controller

-B, --coldboot

Cold boot controller

-E, --exception

Trigger exception

-i, --index <num>

Use specified controller

-h, --help

Show help options
body:
BLUEMOON

NAME

bluemoon - Bluemoon configuration utility

DESCRIPTION

bluemoon - Bluemoon configuration utility Usage:

bluemoon [options]

OPTIONS

-A, --bdaddr [addr]

Set Bluetooth address

-F, --firmware [file]

Check firmware image

Reset controller

-B, --coldboot
